Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Mummy mask
Description: Lower left corner of a the front of a mummy mask with the hair of the wig falling in front of the shoulder. The latter is decorated with an Osiris figure sitting on a throne. On the edge, there are rozettes and udjat-eyes. Cream-coloured background, black contours.
